# Spigot Plugin Project Instructions

This is a Spigot 1.21 Minecraft server plugin that provides restart functionality.

## Project Structure
- Maven-based Java project
- Main plugin class extends JavaPlugin
- Command handler for /resta and /resta stop
- Countdown timer system with broadcasts

## Development Notes
- Target Spigot API: 1.21
- Java version: 17+
- Build system: Maven
